CAMPAIGN_NAME: Omya Hustadmarmor mine discharge biological effects assessment
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Blue mussels collected from Oslo fjord, placed in nylon mesh socks (5 pockets of 20 mussels each), attached to moorings positioned at depths of 18-20m for 8 weeks

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Omya Hustadmarmor mine discharge biological effects assessment
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Mussels freeze-dried, homogenised, extracted 3x using acetonitrile/formic acid and centrifuged. Dried under nitrogen stream and reconstituted in acetonitrile/formic acid.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Omya Hustadmarmor mine discharge biological effects assessment
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Mussels freeze-dried, homogenised, extracted 3x using acetonitrile/formic acid and centrifuged. Dried under nitrogen stream and reconstituted in acetonitrile/formic acid.

CAMPAIGN_NAME: Omya Hustadmarmor mine discharge biological effects assessment
PROTOCOL_COMMENT: Metal concentrations determined in homogenized whole soft tissue samples using inductively coupled plasma-mass spectrometer (ICP-MS, Perkin-Elmer Sciex ELAN 6000)
